item.title: Using Habits to Hack Your Life
item.description: How to actually accomplish your New Year’s resolutions and keep the cycle of self-improvement churning. Every morning as I leave for work, I grab my keys off the same place on the counter, stuff my feet into my boots, and lock the door. Then I walk down two flights of stairs, and ask myself — did I lock the door? For the first 3 weeks or so, I’d go back up and check.
